sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an ace of spades from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2:
There is only one ace of spades in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing an ace of spades is 1 out of 52, which can be represented as a fraction:

1/52

As a decimal, this is approximately:

0.01923

So the probability of drawing an ace of spades from a standard deck of 52 playing cards is approximately 1.923%.
